app_descript:
App Name: Caffeine

App Package Name: tv.caffeine.app

Brief: Step into the electrifying world of live entertainment with Caffeine, the app where excitement never fades. Whether you're at home or on the move, Caffeine offers a tailored selection of live streaming channels covering video games, sports, and an array of exhilarating events. Engage in real-time with an active community, enjoy seamless chat features, and consume content curated by iconic figures like Drake. Ready to dive into live-action gaming, sports, and more? Caffeine is your digital ticket to an endless stream of entertainment.
